attributes.action: Teachers cannot deny students access to restrooms during class periods.
attributes.additional_details: I feel like it is against our human rights that we even need permission to ask to go to the restroom also that holding in urine can damage your kidneys.
attributes.background: I want the government to enforce a rule that teachers should never deny a student access to the toilet.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for the same action:

Require schools to allow students to have access to the toilet during lessons:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643422
